description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Whenever anyone has invented anything, people have gathered to see who's the fastest at it. Up to 4 player split-screen allows sweet old racing for modern gamers. Perfectly complimented by peppy piano music making this a fun pastime from past times.
